'''Lantern Rite''' is an annual [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 1.3]]. This event celebrates [[Liyue]]'s [[Lantern Rite Festival]]. It is a {{w|Chinese New Year}} event involving [[Xiao]] that honors the deceased [[adepti|adeptus]] [[Skybracer]]. A similar version of the event was previously ran during the [[Version/0.7.1|2nd Closed Beta]].

==Event Details==
The Lantern Rite event is divided into 5 sections: [[#All That Glitters|All That Glitters]], [[#Lantern Rite Tales|Lantern Rite Tales]], [[#Theater Mechanicus|Theater Mechanicus]], the [[#Xiao Market|Xiao Market]], and [[#Stand by Me|Stand by Me]].

During the event period, Travelers can claim a 4-star [[Liyue]] [[character]] of their choice in [[Lantern Rite/Stand by Me|Stand by Me]]. Complete challenges in [[Lantern Rite/Theater Mechanicus|Theater Mechanicus]] to obtain [[Peace Talisman]]s, which can be spent in the [[Xiao Market]] on rewards including [[Crown of Insight]] and a new [[namecard]] style [[Namecard#Celebration: Lantern-Light|Celebration: Lantern-Light]].

===Requirements===
*[[Adventure Rank]] 23 or above
*Complete [[Archon Quests]] [[Of the Land Amidst Monoliths|Chapter I: Act I - Of the Land Amidst Monoliths]]
*Complete [[Xiao]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Alatus Chapter]] Act I: [[Butterfly's Dream]]

===Festive Fever===
[[Festive Fever]] is used as a pre-requisite for unlocking content for the [[#Lantern Rite Tales|Lantern Rite Tales]], [[#Theater Mechanicus|Theater Mechanicus]], and [[#Stand By Me|Stand By Me]] events.

Festive Fever is split into 3 stages and in order to progress to the next stage, players must complete quests from the '''All that Glitters''' part of the Lantern Rite event and complete requests in the Lantern Rite Tales event.
{| class="wikitable"
!Stage !! Requirements
|-
| We've Only Just Begun || Complete [[The Origin of the Lanterns]]
|-
| Guests Flock From Afar || Collect 900 [[Festive Fever]] from [[Lantern Rite Tales]]<br>Complete [[Currents Deep Beneath the Lanterns]]
|-
| Glow of a Thousand Lanterns || Collect 1,800 [[Festive Fever]] from [[Lantern Rite Tales]]<br>Complete [[Light Upon the Sea]]
|}

==Lantern Rite Tales==
{{Main|Lantern Rite Tales}}

Complete requests in "Lantern Rite Tales" to win [[Primogems]] and increase '''Festive Fever'''. Accumulating certain amounts of '''Festive Fever''' is required to progress through the Lantern Rite.

{| class="wikitable"
! Part !! Requirement
|-
| I || Complete "[[The Origin of the Lanterns]]"
|-
| II || Reach the Festive Fever stage '''Guests Flock From Afar'''<br>Complete [[Currents Deep Beneath the Lanterns]]<br>Complete all requests in '''Lantern Rite Tales I'''
|-
| III || Reach the Festive Fever stage '''Glow of a Thousand Lanterns'''<br>Complete [[Light Upon the Sea]]<br>Complete all requests in '''Lantern Rite Tales II'''
|}

==Stand by Me==
{{Main|Lantern Rite/Stand by Me|l1=Stand by Me}}
